akn:section.akn:heading: Lands acquired as part of park; rules and regulations

akn:content.akn:p: § 410r–2. Lands acquired as part of park; rules and regulations All lands and submerged lands title to which is accepted by the Secretary of the Interior pursuant to the provisions of section 410r–1 of this title shall, upon the acceptance of title thereto, become parts of the Everglades National Park and shall be subject to all laws and regulations applicable thereto. (Pub. L. 86–681, § 2, Sept. 2, 1960, 74 Stat. 577.)
